com.emc.storageos.model.network

Class NetworkSystemUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.storageos.model.network.NetworkSystemUpdate

  • public class NetworkSystemUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    These are the arguments used for updating (PUT) to a Network System.

      • getIpAddress

        public java.lang.String getIpAddress()
        IP address of the Network System for SSH communication. This field is applicable for network systems of type 'mds'. It is ignored for 'brocade' type network systems and can be null.

      • setIpAddress

        public void setIpAddress(java.lang.String ipAddress)

      • getPortNumber

        @Range(min=1L,
       max=65535L)
public java.lang.Integer getPortNumber()
        Port number of the Network System for SSH communication. This field is applicable for network systems of type 'mds'. It is ignored for 'brocade' type network systems and can be null.

      • setPortNumber

        public void setPortNumber(java.lang.Integer portNumber)

      • getUserName

        public java.lang.String getUserName()
        User name used for SSH login to the Network System. This field is applicable for network systems of type 'mds'. It is ignored for 'brocade' type network systems and can be null.

      • getSmisUseSsl

        public java.lang.Boolean getSmisUseSsl()
        Determines the protocol used for connection purposes. If HTTPS, then set true, else false. This field is applicable for network systems of type 'brocade'. It is ignored for 'mds' type network systems and can be null.
